roadmapItems.description: Builds a solid base in modern programming through problem-solving and algorithmic thinking. Python is a key tool for AI, automation, and robotics.

roadmapItems.description: Learn performance-focused programming for embedded systems and robotics. Covers memory management, OOP, and system-level control.

roadmapItems.title: Robot Operating System (ROS) for Engineers
roadmapItems.description: Hands-on introduction to building robotic applications with ROS, from simulation to real-world deployment. Bridges the gap between research and prototyping.

roadmapItems.title: PLC Programming & Industrial Automation
roadmapItems.platform: Siemens TIA Portal Academy / Udemy / LinkedIn Learning
roadmapItems.description: Practical training in PLC programming, ladder logic, and SCADA integration, essential for industrial and building automation.

learningGoals: I am focused on building a strong foundation in both automation and robotics
My goal is to become a versatile and reliable engineer, capable of improving real-world systems
I want to develop solutions that are practical, efficient, and well-executed, while continuing to grow my skills to stay at the forefront of automation and robotics technologies.
